name: CQ.Ext.tree.DefaultSelectionModel
doc: The default single selection for a TreePanel.

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: isSelected
methods.doc: Returns true if the node is selected

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.

methods.name: selectNext
methods.doc: Selects the node above the selected node in the tree, intelligently walking the nodes

methods.name: selectPrevious
methods.doc: Selects the node above the selected node in the tree, intelligently walking the nodes

events.name: beforeselect
events.doc: Fires before the selected node changes, return false to cancel the change

events.name: selectionchange
events.doc: Fires when the selected node changes
